name: Oil Painting Workshop
description: Capture the warmth and texture of fresh lemons in this class, perfect for beginners and art lovers alike. Learn step-by-step techniques while creating your own colourful still life painting.

name: Piazzolla and Tango
description:
Get ready to immerse yourself in the passionate world of Argentine tango! 

Experience the soul-stirring music of the legendary composer Astor Piazzolla and lose yourself in the seductive rhythms. Let the music transport you to the bustling streets of Buenos Aires as you witness the beauty and intensity of this iconic dance.

Come and enjoy an unforgettable evening filled with music, dance, and culture. Don't miss out on this unique opportunity to indulge in the magic.

name: A Clay Sculpting Workshop
description:
Treat yourself to the therapeutic experience of sculpting at Artbox Studio Gallery. Learn how to create a piece of sculpture art unique to you. No experience needed.

Please see more Sculpting Workshops here: https://www.artboxstudiogallery.com/sculpting

name: A Glow in the Dark Paint Night Workshop
description:
Do something outside of the box with this unforgettable glow-in-the-dark paint night! Enjoy a guided sensory experience that will bring out your inner artist. Immerse yourself in our luminescent art studio and create a unique glowing masterpiece—no experience needed. Snacks and refreshments included.

Please see more Glow in the Dark Workshops here: https://www.artboxstudiogallery.com/glow-in-the-dark-paint

name: A Canvas Connection: Date Night Paint Night Workshop
description:
Welcome to Date Night Paint Night at Artbox Studio Gallery – a candle-lit, romantic and artistic evening like no other! Bring your partner out for a unique experience where you'll collaborate to create a set of two paintings that will make one connected masterpiece together! 

Please see more Date Night Workshops here: https://www.artboxstudiogallery.com/date-night

name: Caribbean Board Games and Brunch
description:
Jeopardy Caribbean Style | Island Slang Challenge | Domino & Ludo Madness | Nuff Nuff island food & drinks. + Sign Up. Show Up. Win!!!

So, you think you know the Caribbean. But do you, really? Put your knowledge to the test and you could win prizes. Contests include:

Caribbean Trivia – With Jeopardy/Wheel of ‘Fawchun’ (Fortune) style games with categories like island history, culture, sports, music and… win prizes!
Give Directions Island Style – if you’re from the Caribbean or been to the Caribbean…you know.
Plus, just Show Up! Sign Up! Win Prizes!
Slap down some Dominoes | Play Ludi (Ludo)…and more
Come lyme with us on the Sunday of the May long weekend.

name: Read - Intro to Bread: Challah
description:
Join us for our Challah Class! This class is great for absolute beginners! And you will achieve all this in just one day! 

Spend two hours with our talented chef to learn the art of making Challah. You will walk away with not one but two loaves of this heavenly bread. One classic braided Challah and one filled loaf. You will learn the building blocks for tackling any bread recipe with confidence and success after you attend this class. You will mix your own dough from pre-scaled ingredients that our chef prepares for you. 

Please note, classes may be held in our upstairs studio which is accessible by stairs only, please email us if you need to be accommodated.

name: La marche hantée originale de Toronto

location.name: Courtyard outside the Hockey Hall of Fame

description: Rejoignez-nous pour un voyage effrayant et palpitant à travers l’histoire sombre de la ville, en plongeant dans le monde des fantômes, cimetières, pendaisons et lieux hantés. Préparez-vous à être captivés par des histoires de fantômes frissonnantes de théâtres hantés, de mystères irrésolus, de secrets cachés à la vue de tous et de bâtiments historiques effrayants. Notre visite en plein air vous fera vivre une aventure paranormale époustouflante, débutant de la cour située devant le Temple de la renommée du hockey. Préparez-vous à voir la ville sous un nouveau jour, ou plutôt dans l’obscurité, en découvrant les histoires mystérieuses et surnaturelles qui se cachent dans ses ombres

name: Guided Walks at Rouge National Urban Park

location.name: Woodland Trail - Meet in front of parking lot

description: Join us to discover the park's natural, cultural and agricultural stories with friendly and knowledgeable Parks Canada volunteer leaders and staff. We have something for everyone — wildlife sightings, quiet nature walks, discovering the past, fitness challenges or meeting new people! Please visit our website for more information and cancellation notice.

name: Saturday Dinner Groove Party with Waleed Kush Afro-Jazz
description: Canadian multi-instrumentalist, composer, vocalist, music and film producer, known for his striking vocals, innovative bass technique, and his speed and precision on percussion. He has been an active member of the Toronto music scene since his arrival, in 1991 from Sudan, where he began to perform as early as six years old.

name: Sunday Night with The Grand Arabic Jam Volume 6 - Illustrious Iraqi Music
description:
Your favourite is back for more. This time it's ليالي العراق.

Get ready for a night filled with the vibrant sounds of Iraq's diverse musical landscape from folklore to modern classics. Grab your instruments and get ready to play, or come out to watch your friends play and dance along to the music. We can't wait to see you there! Followed up by none other than Moneka Arabic Jazz.

name: Custom Tote Bag Workshop
description: Choose to paint directly or create a digital collage to heat press onto your bag. We provide the tools, guidance, and plenty of room for creative freedom.

name: Jokers Wild: Strip Poker meets Roast Battle Comedy
description:
Comedians bare it all for your laughs at a show that combines explosive roast battles with strip poker!

Comedians come on stage and sling fiery roast jokes, and whosever doesn’t land takes off a piece of clothing. The battle ends when one is down to their unmentionables - or if they forfeit first.

One things for sure - the show will be a night to remember. And that’s the naked truth.

Created and Hosted by Roast Master Bash

Warning: This is a roast show. No subject matter is off limits. While we can promise our main goal is to be funny, we cannot promise they’ll be to everyone’s taste. Please exercise discretion when buying tickets!

name: Serata Karaoke
description:
What’s better than dancing to your favourite songs - singing them too! We are turning up the volume and handing the mic to Italian culture enthusiasts. There will be lyrics on the big screen, mics in the crowd and a DJ turning the entire place into one massive dance floor!  Whether you belt it out or just vibe along, you’ll be surrounded by a crowd that came to sing, dance and celebrate Italian music!  

Must be legal-drinking age to attend. Valid government ID will be checked at the door.

name: Community Environment Day at Bermondsey Drop-Off Depot
description:
Help reduce the amount of waste going to landfill. Drop off household items for donation, electronics for reuse or recycling and household hazardous waste for proper disposal.  Pick up free bagged compost while supplies last and kitchen catchers for organics ($7 each – cash, debit and credit accepted).

At Drop-Off Depot events, a safe motorized vehicle is required to drop off waste for disposal and all loads must be properly secured. Walk-ins, bicycles and manual transportation devices are not permitted. Any unsafe vehicles or unsecured loads will be refused entry.

name: Music in the Museum at Gibson House
description:
Rusterrat
Re-imagining traditional Korean music & arts through technology - featuring zithers, synthesizers, and an art installation.

organizer.name: Gibson House Museum - City of Toronto Museums and Heritage Services
